ticket.title: Migration differences are unnoticed if one model inherits from another
ticket.original-body:
When a model, Bar, inherits from Foo as Bar < Foo, and when the create_bars migration has a column which is *not* in the create_foos migration, the column is not created.
I created an example app to show the problem. Should be easy and quick to replicate - http://github.com/biv/migrations_and_inheritance_bug
